name: Infernal Racket
description: Smash, shatter, and destroy EVERYTHING in an addicting and frenetic platfomer! Cover the screen in satisfying shrapnel explosions made of fine china, glassware and vases, sculptures, paintings, and more!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.5 Ghz Dual-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 660 or equivalent Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 or newer Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 or newer Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
